name: Kung Fu Panda Poo The Running Game
name_original: Kung Fu Panda Poo The Running Game
description:
Endless Runner Kung Fu Panda 3D Game created in Unity 3D by skinning a unity game. Panda can run on the ground while avoiding training dummy and eating sushi (Cooked rice) to either increase its stamina or running time. This is the preview of a game.

Game Controls:

  • Arrow keys to run.
  • Space Bar to jump
  • Escape Key to pause

3D Models:

You Can Download Dummy And Rice Models free From Sketchfab.

Rice: Download Here

Dummy: Download Here

You can purchase Panda 3D models for games, renders, and animations from here.

Thank you. Suggestions, feedback, and criticism are always welcomed.
